ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Problem Signing On/Staying On
ygData.msgSnippet: It could be anything from her ISP, her phone line, her modem, to a virus on her computer. It all depends. She would have to speak to tech support for
ygData.messageBody:
It could be anything from her ISP, her phone line, her modem, to a virus on
her computer.
It all depends. She would have to speak to tech support for troubleshooting.
I *think* it's eqtech@...
luv,
-Su

>
> I have a friend who is having an unusually difficult time signing on and
> staying online. It seems that just about any time she zones, you can
> assume she will not be on anymore.
>
> Is this a common problem? Does anyone have some "quick fix" ideas that
> might keep her from being punted so easily?
>
> Thanks for any help.
>
> "Alazais"
>
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
